description: Shows desktop notification on finish and plays sound (optional)

params.name: no_sound
params.description: Set to 1 or 0 - to turn the sound off/on for notification

params.name: aliases
params.description: List of aliases separated by whitespace

params.name: command
params.description: Command to execute. Specify either the command or command_file (if both specified, command_file is ignored)

params.name: command_file
params.description: Txt command file containing the command to execute (CLI command inside). Specify either the command or command_file (if both specified, command_file is ignored)

params.name: metadata_file
params.description: JSON file containing command parameters description and replacement placeholder

params.name: param_boundary_placeholder
params.description: Provide special string for parameter boundary (string which precedes and follows parameter placeholder) - if you don't want to use default {param_name} syntax

params.name: aliases
params.description: List of aliases separated by whitespace
